page.title: 12Clubs
page.content: There is a{'club-room'}in the village of{Stanford Dingley}which is available for{PCC}meetings and for private functions ( e.g children's parties ), for a nominal hire charge. Many of the local inhabitants attend lectures given in the nearby village hall of {Bradfield.}The type of scope offered includes{'Italian','How to dig up your {family tree'}and{'local history'}and are usually fairly informal. The local {W.I}receives visiting speakers. Recent topics include{'The history and origin {of the fire brigade', 'a display and {talk on Flat Irons', 'Local history' and{'Flower arranging'.}There are a large number of{charitable}activities e.g sponsored walks and beard growing. The{Evergreen club}visits places of outstanding interest e.g a recent excursion to the Tropical Bird Gardens at Rode near Bath.
